attributes.action: Deportation of migrants who commit a serious crime within 5 years upon arrival.
attributes.additional_details: Protects society and also portrays our country as a immigrant friendly place however it also shows how we will not tolerate anyone who does not abide by our laws.
attributes.background: Deportation or crime commiting immigrants in the UK, so the Government still get tax money from immigrants who don't commit crimes however it keeps the prisons less crowded and keeps the streets safer.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was submitted, the Government have announced policies about this issue: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/foreign-criminals-to-face-immediate-deportation

If you would like something different, you could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
